frontmatter.title: A Method to Measure and Manage Technical Debt
frontmatter.description: we demonstrate that not only is technical debt key to making decisions regarding any specific application, it is also important when attempting to prioritize work between multiple applications.

frontmatter.title: Exploring a Metrics-Driven Approach to Transformation
frontmatter.description: When we started providing professional services around enterprise Kubernetes, it became clear we needed a program-level framework for adopting containers that spelled out the activities of multiple project teams.
